headline: JPM26: ThermoFisher ‘very positive’ on strategic M&A as deals expand capabilities
summary: ThermoFisher expects revenue growth in the 3–6% range for 2026 and 2027, and a growth rate of 7% or more in 2028 and beyond.

headline: Thermo Fisher wins contracts as pharma shifts production to US, CEO says
summary: By Sneha S K and Gnaneshwar Rajan Jan 13 (Reuters) - Thermo Fisher Scientific's pharmaceutical services business has won a number of contracts to help its customers move production from Europe or Asia
